trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control that is hosted in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.
trans-unit.target: Representa um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> hospedado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> work together so that users can directly edit values in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control column.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> trabalham juntos para que os usuários possam editar diretamente valores em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> coluna do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, and is designed to host the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>, which derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> deriva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>e foi projetado para hospedar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>, que deriva de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controle.

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties, events, and methods of the base control, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> events with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Além das propriedades, eventos e métodos do controle base, você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> eventos com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnKeyPress%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.OnMouseDown%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> hosted by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como obter o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox> hospedado por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" /> is in a mode that allows either editing or navigating.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox" /> está em um modo que permite edição ou navegação.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the controls is in navigation mode, and editing has not begun; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se os controles estiver no modo de navegação e edição não foi iniciado; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox.IsInEditOrNavigateMode%2A> property is used within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> to determine how to process key press events, to check the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox.IsInEditOrNavigateMode%2A> propriedade é usada no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ProcessKeyMessage%2A> para determinar como processar eventos de pressionamento de tecla, para verificar o estado de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBox>.

trans-unit.source: For example, if one of the navigation (arrow) keys is pressed, the appropriate action for the state of the control must occur.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se uma das teclas de navegação (seta) é pressionada, deve ocorrer a ação apropriada para o estado do controle.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passed by reference, that contains the key data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />, passada pela referência, que contém os dados da chave.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the key pressed is processed further (for example, to navigate, or escape).
trans-unit.target: Indica se a tecla pressionada é processada ainda mais (por exemplo, para navegar ou escapar).

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é somente para leitura.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is consumed, <see langword="false" /> to if the key is further processed.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a chave for consumida, <see langword="false" /> se a chave passar por mais processamento.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when a control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado quando um controle recebe uma mensagem do teclado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control that hosts the control.
trans-unit.target: O controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> que hospeda o controle.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> control belongs.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> ao qual este controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox" /> pertence.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Aciona o evento <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc(System.Windows.Forms.Message@)" />.
